page.title: 20BURNHAM MARKET - THE FUTURE
page.content:
Burnham Market has changed gradually, but this still remains an agricultural area, as it has been for many centuries. The past 40 years have seen much new building, especially within this survey area, and have seen a shift in the population structure of the village, with many more retired people living here and many more tourists visiting. If plans for major estate development in the area succeed this village will change dramatically: in the next century Burnham Market might not be the village of beauty and charm which it is at present.
* * * * * *
This project was compiled by members of Burnham Market Afternoon Women's Institute.
